artists.bio: Glass Moon Tattoo's co-owner and resident tattooer Megan began her art career as a painter and has always been drawn to abstraction, expressionism and impressionism. Megan loves to tattoo all things figure and floral related and aims to make everything as unique as possible. When Megan is not tattooing she loves dancing, karaoke and her many best friends.
artists.booking: Megan is currently only booking flash and predrawn designs, she is not currently accepting custom design requests, to see her newest designs and get the latest info about when her next designs will be released, please see her instagram page.

artists.bio: Glass Moon Tattoo's co-owner and resident tattooer Carly Zehring puts her own bright and fun twist on a traditional style of tattoo. She loves all things crystal, plant and cat-related. When shes not working she loves traveling, dad rock, and her partner Leo.
artists.booking: Carly is currently only booking flash and predrawn designs, she is not currently accepting custom design requests, to see her newest designs and get the latest info about when her next designs will be released, please see her instagram page.

artists.bio: Anya has been tattooing for about four and a half years now; she loves tattooing all things nature related, especially floral compositions, birds and animals. She loves tattooing in color, black and gray or even a mixture of the two! When Anya is not tattooing she loves traveling snowboarding/camping/exploring, as well as spending time with her friends, family and two amazing dogs.
artists.booking: Anya is not currently accepting new clients but will be taking on new projects in January of 2023, please see her instagram page to stay updated regarding when and how she will be accepting new clients.

artists.bio: Howdy, my name's Mattie and I'm a traditional tattooer. I love mixing feminity with traditional themes to create cute but bold tattoos. I love color and black and grey, and loooove tattooing ladies, plants, and mushrooms! I have lots of flash always available to choose from and love custom projects!
artists.booking: To book use the link in my Instagram bio and fill out a form! Or just send me an email with what you'd like and your availability!
